title: Effects of recirculation and air change per hour on COVID-19 transmission in indoor settings: A CFD study with varying HVAC parameters
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Md Tariqul Islam, Yijie Chen, Dahae Seong, Marc Verhougstraete, Young- Jun Son
